skills.name: Acrobatics
skills.description: You can perform acrobatic maneuvers like tumbling, balancing, and escaping from restraints.

skills.name: Arcana
skills.description: You understand the fundamental principles of magic and can identify magical effects.

skills.name: Athletics
skills.description: You can perform athletic feats like climbing, jumping, swimming, and breaking objects.

skills.name: Crafting
skills.description: You can create and repair items, identify alchemical substances, and recall knowledge about crafting.

skills.name: Deception
skills.description: You can trick and mislead others through lies, misdirection, and false identities.

skills.name: Diplomacy
skills.description: You can influence others through negotiation, persuasion, and social grace.

skills.name: Intimidation
skills.description: You can frighten foes and force others to act against their better judgment through threats.

skills.name: Lore
skills.description: You have specialized knowledge in a particular field or subject.

skills.name: Medicine
skills.description: You can patch up wounds, identify diseases and poisons, and provide medical care.

skills.name: Nature
skills.description: You understand the natural world, including animals, plants, weather, and terrain.

skills.name: Occultism
skills.description: You study the occult, including divination, necromancy, and other esoteric magical traditions.

skills.name: Performance
skills.description: You can entertain others through acting, comedy, dancing, music, oratory, or other performances.

skills.name: Religion
skills.description: You understand divine magic, religious traditions, and the planes where deities reside.

skills.name: Society
skills.description: You understand the people and systems that make up civilization.

skills.name: Stealth
skills.description: You can avoid detection, move silently, and hide from enemies.

skills.name: Survival
skills.description: You can survive in the wilderness, track creatures, and navigate natural environments.

skills.name: Thievery
skills.description: You can pick locks, disable devices, and pickpocket others without being noticed.
